title: Drivers face delays on Beltway’s outer loop
text:
Drivers on the Capital Beltway’s outer loop should expect delays after three vehicles were involved in a crash between Georgia and Connecticut avenues.

The delays are building at six miles, officials said.

Traffic Advisory - OL I495 Btwn Georgia Avenue & Connecticut Avenue near Mormon Temple, some lanes were blocked, vehicles moved to shoulder https://t.co/dQAyzOTKdd — Pete Piringer (@mcfrsPIO) October 1, 2019

It’s not immediately clear if anyone was seriously hurt.

Crash. I-495 WB (OL) before MD-185. Montgomery County, MD. Two left lanes are blocked with two right lanes getting by. Delays begin near I-95, 6 miles. Consider alternate routes. — MATOC Alerts (@MATOC) October 1, 2019

Transportation officials warned that commuters were likely to experience delays.
description: Delays were reported on Beltway's outer loop near Georgia Avenue after three cars were involved in a crash.
